org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.output

Class NiReportsFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.output.NiReportsFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NiReportDataVisitor<ReportAreaImpl>, NiReportOutputBuilder<ReportAreaImpl>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmpNiReportsFormatter

    public class NiReportsFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements NiReportDataVisitor<ReportAreaImpl>
    Part of the (NiReportsCore, AmpReportsSchema, Reports API) intersection - translates NiOut output into ReportsAPI output. e.g. turns the NiOutCell hierarchy into ReportCell hierarchy and the NiReportData hierarchy into ReportAreaImpl hierarchy
